subject: Warranty Question
body:
Hello,

I bought a SalonElite 9000 and the ionic feature seems weaker than before. I run a salon and we use it heavily.

Not sure if this is covered. Let me know what info you need.

James Wilson
890 Commerce Blvd
Los Angeles, CA 90001

metadata.reason: Missing: purchase date, serial number, proof of purchase, detailed problem description
